text: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter is series of vans, trucks and buses produced by Mercedes-Benz in three generations since 1995. Dodge and Freightliner made the same vehicle in the United States but with different names, The names were Dodge Sprinter and Freightliner Sprinter. == First generation (1995–2006) == The first generation Mercedes Benz Sprinter, Dodge Sprinter and Freightliner Sprinter was created in 1995 In early 2000's, the model was improved at the front and back, It had a new grille, new bonnet, new bumpers and different headlamps. File:Mercedes sprinter 1 v sst.jpg|Mercedes-Benz Sprinter before improvements File:Mercedes sprinter 1 h sst.jpg|Mercedes-Benz Sprinter before improvements File:Mercedes Sprinter front 20080102.jpg|Mercedes-Benz Sprinter after improvements File:Mercedes Sprinter rear 20080102.jpg|Mercedes-Benz Sprinter after improvements File:Dodge-Sprinter.jpg|Dodge Sprinter after improvements File:Freightliner Sprinter 2500 SHC.jpg|Freightliner Sprinter after improvements == Second generation (2006–2018) == The second generation Mercedes Benz Sprinter, Dodge Sprinter and Freightliner Sprinter was created in 2006 In 2014, the model was improved at the front and back, It had a new grille, new bonnet, new bumper and different headlamps. In 2014, Dodge stopped making the Sprinter.
